description: Right heart strain is characterized by the dilation of the right ventricle, right atrial enlargement, and bowing of the interventricular septum.

attributes.name: Presence
attributes.description: Indicates whether right heart strain is present or absent.

attributes.name: Dilation of Right Ventricle
attributes.description: Indicates whether there is dilation of the right ventricle.

values.name: Yes
values.description: There is dilation of the right ventricle.

values.name: No
values.description: There is no dilation of the right ventricle.

attributes.name: Right Atrial Enlargement
attributes.description: Indicates whether there is right atrial enlargement.

values.name: No
values.description: There is no right atrial enlargement.

attributes.name: Bowing of Interventricular Septum
attributes.description: Indicates whether there is bowing of the interventricular septum.

values.name: Yes
values.description: There is bowing of the interventricular septum.

values.name: No
values.description: There is no bowing of the interventricular septum.

attributes.name: RV/LV Ratio
attributes.description: Ratio of the right ventricular diameter to the left ventricular diameter.
